= Download all sqlite files =

For downloading all sqlite files, you can use the following Linux script.

{{{
#!/bin/bash
#set -x

adb shell "su -c 'find / -iname "*.db" -exec chmod 666 "{}" \;'"
adb shell "su -c 'find / -iname "*.db" >/data/local/tmp/sqlite3.txt'"
adb pull /data/local/tmp/sqlite3.txt .
cat sqlite3.txt | while read FILE_SQLITE
do 
    adb pull ${FILE_SQLITE} .${FILE_SQLITE}
done

exit 0
}}}

== Note ==

The Android device must to be rooted.
